pageTitle: Prime Ministerâ€™s itinerary for Monday, November 29, 2021 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

Private meetings

The Prime Minister will speak with the Premier of Nunavut, P.J. Akeeagok.

11:20 a.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the Special Envoy on Preserving Holocaust Remembrance and Combatting Antisemitism, the Honourable Irwin Cotler.

Closed to media
